sect1.title: HDFSPipe.PipeIn

row.entry: The ECL recordset definition name to generate.
The Hadoop data file name as it exists in the HDFS.
The ECL RECORD structure representing the structure of the Hadoop data.
The Hadoop data file format : FLAT | CSV.
The Hadoop DFS host name or IP address.

sect1.para: The HDFSPipe.PipeIn macro is called to pipe in data from the Hadoop file system (HDFS) to a Thor Cluster.
